dependencies.description:
METIS is a set of serial programs for partitioning graphs, partitioning
finite element meshes, and producing fill reducing orderings for sparse
matrices. The algorithms implemented in METIS are based on the
multilevel recursive-bisection, multilevel k-way, and multi-constraint
partitioning schemes.
dependencies.name: metis

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependencies.name: py-pytest

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
costo stand for COSimulation TOols. Its a layer above MPI to share data
between meshes.
dependent_to.name: costo

description: METIS partitioner for mesh and graphMETIS partitioner for mesh and graph
name: py-mgmetis

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
